  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Relativna hitrost in trki</string>
            <string language="en">Relative Velocity in Collisions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relative Geschwindigkeit in den Zusammenstößen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse relative dans les collisions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade relativa nas colisões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità relativa negli scontri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετική ταχύτητα στις συγκρούσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad relativa en colisiones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dva vozička prožno trčita in pri tem ohranita skupno gibalno količino.</string>
            <string language="en">Elastic collision occurs between two carts but the momentum of a system does not change.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trk</string>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ohranitev gibalne količine</string>
            <string language="en">conservation of momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastischer Zusammenstoß tritt zwischen zwei 
Karren auf, aber das Momentum eines Systems ändert nicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La collision élastique se produit entre deux 
chariots mais l'élan d'un système ne change pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A colisão elástica ocorre entre dois carros mas
o momentum de um sistema não muda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scontro elastico si presenta fra due carrelli 
ma la quantità di moto di un sistema non cambia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ελαστική σύγκρουση εμφανίζεται μεταξύ δύο κάρρων 
αλλά η ορμή ενός συστήματος δεν αλλάζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La colisión elástico ocurre entre dos carros 
pero el ímpetu de un sistema no cambia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhaltung des Momentums</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie d'élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conservation de momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scontro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conservazione di quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγκρουση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντήρηση της ορμής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colisión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conservación del ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
